definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: This paper tries to explore the application of fine powder technology to Chinese medicinal herbs and insoluble medicines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就難溶藥物與中草藥微細化技術作出探索性研究。

sentences.english: Researches show that Valeriana is a kind of herbal medicine with exploiture future and worthy of researching farther.
sentences.chinese: 纈草是很具有開發前途的中草藥，值得進一步研究。

sentences.english: There is no wholesale market for Chinese herbal medicine in Shijiazhuang, where the specific location?
sentences.chinese: 石家莊有沒有中草藥材批發市場，具體地點在哪裏？

sentences.english: And in the event that you do fall ill, stock up on herbal remedies like ginseng and black elderberry.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你生病了，你可以使用人蔘和黑接骨木等中草藥。

sentences.english: The first part is about experimental study on Chinese traditional medicine resisting NDV.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分爲中草藥抗新城疫病毒的試驗研究。

sentences.english: As parents boil up the chinese medicine herbs an abnoxioussmell comes out.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在煎煮中草藥的時候，會產生難聞的氣味。

sentences.english: This is the website of Traditional Chinese Medicine and Acupuncture Electronic Database.
sentences.chinese: 這是中草藥和鍼灸電子數據庫的網站。

sentences.english: Modernized base of Chinese herbal medicine in south Shaanxi has entered all-round construction period.
sentences.chinese: 陝南現代化中草藥基地進入全面建設階段。
這是你所需要的中草藥。

sentences.english: Kidney disease of herb medicine, also calls kidney disease of ar aristolochic acid, cause in Belgium.
sentences.chinese: 中草藥腎病，也稱馬兜鈴酸腎病，起因於比利時。

sentences.english: But one distinctive difference between them is that Mingxing Styling Mousse contains Chinese herb which can help mend your damaged hair.
sentences.chinese: 不同的是它含有中草藥成份對受損的頭髮有補救作用。

sentences.english: The invention discloses Chinese herbal medicine compound premix used for piglets.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了乳仔豬用中草藥複合預混料。

sentences.english: Rhodiola rosea has been widely used as traditional herb medicine in China for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 近數百年以來，紅景天已廣泛用於中國的傳統中草藥。

sentences.english: Columbines and Wizardry Herbs, Inc. is a family-sized manufacturer of quality herbal products.
sentences.chinese: 中草藥公司是一個家庭式的中草藥產品製造商。

sentences.english: Columbines and Wizardry Herbs, Inc. is a family-sized manufacturer of quality herbal products.
sentences.chinese: 中草藥公司是一個家庭式的中草藥產品製造商。

sentences.english: Hepatotoxic reactions to herbal remedies or drugs also merit consideration.
sentences.chinese: 同時應該考慮對中草藥或藥物的肝毒素反應。

definition: lit. food and medicine come from the same source (idiom)/fig. there is no clear-cut distinction between food and medicine
